fullDescription.intro: Pads the layer input with zeros in two dimensions. Corresponds to the Keras Zero-Padding 2D Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.
A tuple of two integers. How many zeros to add at the beginning and at the end of the first spatial dimension.
A tuple of two integers. How many zeros to add at the beginning and at the end of the second spatial dimension.

ul.li: channels_last: corresponds to inputs with shape (height, width, channels)
channels_first: corresponds to inputs with shape (channels, height, width)

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Zero-Padding 2D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Zero-Padding 2D layer.
